announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch 0.18.2 - The Garden
announcements.description: Hey everyone! SkyBlock has been updated to version 0.18.2! This version comes with major updates to the Garden and Stranded, including composter upgrades, NPC sell price changes, Garden Visitor adjustments, and Stranded Lava Fishing.

announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch March 24 - Various Grammatical Fixes
announcements.description: We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock! This update focuses on correcting some grammar mistakes in different areas in the game
